name: CourseRegistration-cds
description: A comprehensive university course registration system with role-based access control, built with SAP CAP, SAPUI5, and Auth0 authentication

scripts.dev: npm run build:apps && node build-srv.js && cds watch
scripts.build: npm run build:srv && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --prefix app/student & npm run build --prefix app/admin & npm run build --prefix app/instructor
scripts.watch:apps: npm run watch --prefix app/student & npm run watch --prefix app/admin & npm run watch --prefix app/instructor
scripts.clean:apps: npm run clean --prefix app/student & npm run clean --prefix app/admin & npm run clean --prefix app/instructor
scripts.clean: npm run clean:apps && npm run clean:srv
